commit.message:
Update Cargo

This pulls in https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/7159, which
ensures that documenting proc macros works correctly.

verification.payload:
tree c5899ddbcaa362eb039b2eaacd311b892f7d68f5
parent 7ac21e7636f7b3c0eb3e31b13c7087b4de7aa5a9
author Aaron Hill <aa1ronham@gmail.com> 1568659540 -0400
committer Aaron Hill <aa1ronham@gmail.com> 1568858030 -0400

Update Cargo

This pulls in https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/7159, which
ensures that documenting proc macros works correctly.
